value:
$WmMPID_セテス,ch17_27_Seteth_M_Normal,Face|...and that is the situation in which
Askr now finds itself.$k$p$WmMPID_イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Normal,Face|Constant attacks from other worlds...
It's no wonder Askr has need of so
many Heroes.$k$p$WmMPID_リンハルト,ch17_08_Linhardt_M_Normal,Face|Never letting your guard down...never
able to rest... That sounds exhausting.$k$p$WmMPID_マリアンヌ,ch17_24_Marianne_F_Normal,Face|So much war... So much sadness...$k$p$WmMPID_ドゥドゥ―,ch17_13_Dodue_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_セテス,ch17_27_Seteth_M_Normal,Face|Several students and faculty from
Garreg Mach have been summoned
to aid the Order of Heroes.$k$pThis is an excellent opportunity to
use what you have learned and forge
a peace for this land. That is all.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|We've been trained to help people.
Being summoned here doesn't
change anything.$k$pI say we show everyone what the
students of Garreg Mach can do.$k$p$WmMPID_リンハルト,ch17_08_Linhardt_M_Normal,Face|As long as I can study Crestology
when we're not fighting, I'll do what
I have to.$k$p$WmMPID_マリアンヌ,ch17_24_Marianne_F_Normal,Face|I pray that the goddess's blessing can
reach Askr as well...$k$p$WmMPID_イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Normal,Face|It looks like the professor and the
class leaders are already out fighting.$k$pUntil we can join up with them, we
may as well spend some time getting
to know this place.$k$p$WmMPID_ドゥドゥ―,ch17_13_Dodue_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_リンハルト,ch17_08_Linhardt_M_Normal,Face|Hm? Dedue, where are you going?$k$p$WmMPID_ドゥドゥ―,ch17_13_Dodue_M_Normal,Face|We know nothing of this world.
I will investigate.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ドゥドゥ―,ch17_13_Dodue_M_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Askr's castle. There is power
and history here.$k$pHm? A greenhouse. Well-maintained.
Healthy flowers as well.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Yes, yes. A lovely place, isn't it?
This is my favorite spot in the castle
as well!$k$p$WmMPID_ドゥドゥ―,ch17_13_Dodue_M_Normal,Face|Hm?$k$p
